name: YOUFIGHT
description: Discover integrated reality with this game mixing 2D fighting and video!Keep your real appearance and become an outstanding boxer in the game thanks to an automated video cutting technique which allows to show some animations from your video capture.
minimum_requirements: OS: 7 Processor:  Memory: 4 GB RAM Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS:  Processor:  Memory: 4 GB RAM Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space
